context.p: Read the requirements for the before connecting power.

The 120-VAC hot wire from the power supply must connect to the black jumper wire or the "L1" terminal-block location in the junction box and the 120-VAC neutral wire must connect to the white jumper wire or the "Neutral" terminal-block location in the junction box for correct polarity. See the juction box diagram .
Power supply connections must be made as follows:

step.cmd: Turn off power at the water heater's Enable/Disable switch and the breaker that supplies power to the water heater.
Remove the junction-box cover. See for junction box location.

Connect the 120-VAC hot wire from the power supply to the black jumper wire or the terminal block location marked "L1" inside of the junction-box located on top of the water heater. If the black jumper wire is used, make the connection inside of the junction box with a properly-sized wire nut. Wrap electrical tape around the wire nut and wire end. See the juction box diagram and the wiring diagram .

info.note: If the electrical connection is made directly to terminal block, remove the black jumper wire before making the connection.

step.cmd:
Connect the 120-VAC neutral wire from the power supply to the white jumper wire or the terminal-block location marked "Neutral" inside of the junction box located on top of the water heater. If the white jumper wire is used, make the connection inside of the junction box with a properly-sized wire nut and wrap electrical tape around the wire nut and wire end. See the juction box diagram
and the wiring diagram .

info.note: If the electrical connection is made directly to the terminal block, remove the white jumper wire before making the connection.

step.cmd: Connect the ground wire from the power supply to the grounding lug inside the junction box. See the juction box diagram and the wiring diagram wiring diagram .
Replace the junction-box cover when the connections are complete.

info.note: Do not apply power to the water heater before the installation is complete and the water heater is filled with water.
